cells.name: Oi kid, I heard that Rose is wanting you ta kill a dragon in the cave the the east. I could use yer help regaurdin’ that if you would hear me out.
Tell me why Rose asked me to stay away from you first.
Rose thinks that bringing back people from the dead ain’t moral. She calls it the 6th element, death magic.
I’m not interested in whatever it is you want.
What do you want me to do?
Then why’d ya come here?
Wait bringing people back to life?
Aye. I came across this fella in the forest recently and unlike you he didn’t make it. If you could collect the dragon’s spirit with this special cantis, I could bring him back.
There’s a sixth element?
I came across this fella in the forest recently and unlike you he didn’t make it. If you could collect the dragon’s spirit with this special cantis, I could bring him back.
Is he... dead?
Aye. But if you get me that dragon’s spirit I could change that. I need to stay here and use my magic to prevent his body from rotting too much.
Why can’t you do it
Right away
I need to stay here and use my magic to prevent his body from rotting too much.
If he comes back would he be the same as before he died?
If you can really help this man then I suppose I will help you.
Bringing back the dead is sick! You’re a psycho!
He won’t be exactly the same but as long as the rot ain’t too bad… he will be okay with the power that dragon’s spirit has. That’s all I can say for certain.
Okay, I’ll bring you the dragon’s spirit.
I trust Rose, I won’t help you.
Well it’s when ya turn life energy inta magic like when ya kill somethin’ that is the only way ta’ have enough magic ta’ bring someone back.
Oh okay.
Isn’t killing one of the other beast enough?
Normally, but he’s been dead a while.
ThorinTalks
Lad did you get that dragon essence?
GotDragonEssence
No, I still need to kill it.
Here it is, I hope it helps.

Well give it here, this spell will take some time to take effect but I’ll tell you a tip to help you learn a little more magic. Now go back you Rose and I’m sure she will give you a proper reward. Also Rose might not like it if she knew ya helped me so might not want to mention it.
Thanks, I hope this does some good.
ThorinTalks
ThorinGivesCantis
QuestStatus_ThorinNecromancyQuest
SpellUnlock
QuestStatus_ThorinNecromancyQuest
Then off with ya!
*Come back after defeating the dragon before going to Rose
QuestTarget_DragonQuest2_QuestCaveLoc
